name: Open World Madout Mafia City
description:
The New Orleans city where your criminal career begins. Roll up on dangerous mobs and fight against the mafias controlling the city of New Orleans. This is a huge city that does not accept lovers of a calm, measured life!

Features:

- Steal and deliver the car.
- Differents modes
- Deliver the parcel for the godfather.
- fantastic cars
- Detonate important buildings into the air.
- Mid-air stunts and sky-high driving tracks
- Kill the mad mafia bosses.
